mapper.insert: insert into comm_board (comm_no ,comm_category, comm_title, comm_content, user_no, regDate, comm_views) values (comm_board_seq.nextval, #{comm_category}, #{comm_title}, #{comm_content}, #{user_no}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from comm_board where comm_category = 'freeBoard' ORDER BY comm_no ASC
select count(*) from comm_board where comm_category = 'feedbackBoard' ORDER BY comm_no ASC
